amendment.description: To prohibit the sale, lease, transfer, retransfer, or delivery of F-16 aircraft, M1 tanks, or certain other defense articles or services to the Government of Egypt.
amendment.purpose: To prohibit the sale, lease, transfer, retransfer, or delivery of F-16 aircraft, M1 tanks, or certain other defense articles or services to the Government of Egypt.

action.text: Amendment SA 9 proposed by Senator Paul.
Motion to table amendment SA 9 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 79 - 19. Record Vote Number: 9.
